original_text: So Peter was kept in prison, but earnest prayer for him was made to God by the church.
korean_text: 이에 베드로는 옥에 갇혔고 교회는 그를 위하여 간절히 하나님께 기도하더라

sentences.original_text: So Peter was kept in prison
but earnest prayer for him was made to God
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그를 위한 간절한 기도가 하나님께 드려졌습니다
